channel.title: Mute Help
channel.description: Then i mute people can still talk... but they cant ::yell

item.title: Mute Help
item.dc:creator: @duhelis duhelis
item.description:
@duhelis wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = true;
                   
                    writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
                    sM("You Have Muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                    yell("["+playerName+"] Has Just Muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                     
                } else {
                   sM("The name doesnt exist.");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sM("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }[/code]

IT SAYS player has been muted…
and then you relog it says you are muted!
but u cant still talk, but u cant ::yell

Read full topic
